Class: LokiMemoryAdapter

LokiMemoryAdapter

new LokiMemoryAdapter(optionsopt)

In in-memory persistence adapter for an in-memory database.
This simple 'key/value' adapter is intended for unit testing and diagnostics.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options object <optional>

memory adapter options

Properties
Name Type Description
asyncResponses boolean

whether callbacks are invoked asynchronously (default: false)
asyncTimeout int

timeout in ms to queue callbacks (default: 50)
Source:
  • lokijs.js, line 1625

Methods

deleteDatabase(dbname, callback)

Deletes a database from its in-memory store.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
dbname string

name of the database (filename/keyname)
callback function

function to call when done

  • lokijs.js, line 1723

loadDatabase(dbname, callback)

Loads a serialized database from its in-memory store. (Loki persistence adapter interface function)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
dbname string

name of the database (filename/keyname)
callback function

adapter callback to return load result to caller

  • lokijs.js, line 1655

name of the database (filename/keyname)
